name: Revenge On Grove Street
description:
Objective

Break into Grove Street, steal all the cash you find and bounce out.

Game Info
  • 2-5 minute playtime.
  • No copyrighted music in game.
  • Interesting story.
Controls RunWJumpSpaceShootLeft-clickInteractE Warning

I do NOT own any rights to GTA and this is NOT an official GTA product. This game is a FAN game.

All donations are considered as a support of the game developer and not as a payment for the game!

This game contains jump scares, flashing lights, and scary and disturbing content.
